'''That Which Was Once Ehecatl''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|The Frozen, Rekindling Land}}. It is the deactivated form of the [[Secret Source Servant]] called [[Ehecatl]].

Returning it to the [[Fallingstar Fields|Tephric Ruins]] grants the {{Achievement|Why Is It Always a Statue Mechanism?}} and unlocks a hidden room with a Luxurious Chest.
